attributes.action: Notice how serious and dangerous fireworks are especially in the wrong hands
attributes.background: Fireworks and other celebrating tools are easily obtainable and dangerous they can cause fires or serious injuries. In fact, sparklers caused more than one-quarter of fireworks-related damage. The problem is that they are easily obtainable and can be brought from supermarkets and shops and passed on

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you are worried about fireworks, but we are not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

If want to ban the sale of fireworks to the public, you may like to sign this petition: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/231147

You could also start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
